Based on the provided information, I have generated multiple tables of risks and their classifications. After reviewing them, I have selected the most consistent and comprehensive table with effective mitigation plans. Here is the table in markdown format:

**Risk Table**

| Risk | Classification | Mitigation Plan |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Negative public opinion on the use of AI | Reputation | Conduct thorough market research to understand public concerns about AI. Develop a communication strategy to address these concerns and promote the benefits of AI-powered education. |
| Energy consumption | Environmental | Optimize the platform's architecture to reduce energy consumption. Use energy-efficient cloud services and implement power-saving features. |
| Dependence on AI model providers | Technical | Develop a diversified AI model ecosystem to reduce dependence on a single provider. Implement AI model validation and testing to ensure accuracy and reliability. |
| Unfriendly interfaces | User Experience | Conduct user testing and gather feedback to improve the platform's user interface. Implement a user-centered design approach to create an intuitive and user-friendly experience. |
| Lack of feedback | Performance | Implement a feedback mechanism to collect user feedback and suggestions. Use this feedback to improve the platform's content and functionality. |
| Poor prioritization of functionalities | Technical | Conduct a thorough analysis of the platform's functionalities and prioritize them based on user needs and business goals. Implement a agile development approach to ensure that the most critical functionalities are developed first. |
| Low visibility on social media | Marketing | Develop a social media strategy to increase visibility and promote the platform. Create engaging content and use paid advertising to reach a wider audience. |
| Difficulty in measuring training quality | Performance | Develop a comprehensive evaluation framework to measure the effectiveness of the training. Use metrics such as training completion rates, quiz scores, and feedback to evaluate the quality of the training. |
| AI use regulations | Legal | Stay up-to-date with the latest AI regulations and guidelines. Ensure that the platform complies with all relevant regulations and laws. |

Note: The classification of risks into categories such as "Reputation", "Environmental", "Technical", "User Experience", "Performance", and "Marketing" is subjective and may vary depending on the context and perspective.
